mapper.select: SELECT BK_DAY , BK_TIME , C.DR_AMOUNT , C.COST_DIV , C.CO_DIV , C.COST_NAME , C.COST_CD FROM DR_COST_INFO A INNER JOIN DR_BK_TIME B ON A.CO_DIV = B.CO_DIV AND A.COST_CD = B.COST_CD AND USE_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN DR_COST_LIST C ON A.CO_DIV = C.CO_DIV AND A.COST_CD = C.COST_CD AND DISPLAY_YN = 'Y' INNER JOIN CD_COMMON D ON C.CO_DIV = D.CO_DIV AND C.COST_DIV = D.CD_CODE AND CD_DIVISION = '003' AND CD_USEYN = 'Y' WHERE B.CO_DIV = #{coDiv} AND B.BAY_CONDI = #{bayCondi} AND B.BK_DAY = #{bkDay} AND B.BK_TIME = #{bkTime} AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' LIMIT 1
